com.facebook.buck.core.rules

Interface ActionGraphBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BuildRuleResolver, SourcePathRuleFinder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractActionGraphBuilder, MultiThreadedActionGraphBuilder, RuleAnalysisCompatibleDelegatingActionGraphBuilder

    public interface ActionGraphBuilder
extends BuildRuleResolver
    Provides methods to interact with the ActionGraph.

    • Method Detail

      • getBuildRules

        Iterable<BuildRule> getBuildRules()
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable view of the rules in the index. Throws an exception if construction fails for any rule.

      • getSuccessfullyConstructedBuildRules

        Iterable<BuildRule> getSuccessfullyConstructedBuildRules()
        Returns:
        an unmodifiable view of the successfully constructed (i.e. didn't throw an exception during construction) rules in the index. Does not throw an exception if construction failed for any rule.

      • computeIfAbsent

        BuildRule computeIfAbsent(BuildTarget target,
                          java.util.function.Function<BuildTarget,BuildRule> mappingFunction)
        Retrieve the BuildRule for the given BuildTarget. If no rules are associated with the target, compute the rule using the given supplier and update the mapping.
        Parameters:
        target - target with which the BuildRule is associated.
        mappingFunction - function to compute the rule.
        Returns:
        the current value associated with the rule

      • requireRule

        BuildRule requireRule(BuildTarget target)
        Retrieve the BuildRule for the given BuildTarget. If no rules are associated with the target, compute it by transforming the TargetNode associated with this build target using the TargetNodeToBuildRuleTransformer associated with this instance.

      • requireMetadata

        <T> Optional<T> requireMetadata(BuildTarget target,
                                Class<T> metadataClass)
        Retrieve a piece of metadata for a target. This metadata is computed via MetadataProvidingDescription.createMetadata(com.facebook.buck.core.model.BuildTarget, com.facebook.buck.core.rules.ActionGraphBuilder, com.facebook.buck.core.cell.CellPathResolver, T, java.util.Optional<com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<com.facebook.buck.core.model.BuildTarget, com.facebook.buck.versions.Version>>, java.lang.Class<U>).

      • addToIndex

        @Deprecated
<T extends BuildRule> T addToIndex(T buildRule)
        Deprecated. 
        Adds to the index a mapping from buildRule's target to itself and returns buildRule.

        Please use computeIfAbsent instead

      • getParallelizer

        Parallelizer getParallelizer()
        Returns a parallelizer object that parallelizes if the current BuildRuleResolver supports parallelism.

      • invalidate

        void invalidate()
        Invalidates this object. All future calls will throw InvalidStateException.

      • requireAllRules

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<BuildRule> requireAllRules(Iterable<BuildTarget> buildTargets)

      • computeAllIfAbsent

        com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedMap<BuildTarget,BuildRule> computeAllIfAbsent(com.google.common.collect.ImmutableMap<BuildTarget,java.util.function.Function<BuildTarget,BuildRule>> mappings)

      • requireRuleFuture

        com.google.common.util.concurrent.ListenableFuture<BuildRule> requireRuleFuture(BuildTarget target)
